allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Aesta Management App

Complete construction site management application with:
- Company and site dashboards
- Attendance tracking and work logs
- Laborer and team management
- Contracts and payments tracking
- Expense and salary management
- Client payment plans and tracking
- Construction phases management

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor client payments to use reusable FileUploader component

- Created new FileUploader component for consistent file upload UI
- Refactored client-payments page to use FileUploader
- Removed duplicate file upload logic and validation
- Improved code reusability and maintainability

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Paid By and Subcontract columns to expenses and payments pages

- Add always-visible "Paid By" and "Subcontract" columns to site expenses table
- Add "Paid By" and "Subcontract" columns to payments detail panel
- Add SettlementEditDialog for editing payment mode, subcontract link, proof upload, and notes
- Add "Unlinked" filter option to subcontract dropdown in payments page

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add visible label for subcontract link option in settlement edit dialog

- Add "Link to Subcontract" header with LinkIcon for better visibility
- Subcontract linking only shows for daily laborer records

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(xargs -I {} sh -c 'grep -l ""CREATE POLICY\\|ALTER TABLE.*ENABLE ROW"" ""{}"" && echo ""$*""')

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move NotificationBell from sidebar to App bar

- Add NotificationBell to top App bar after Sync Status indicator
- Remove NotificationBell from sidebar \(both icon bar and full drawer modes\)
- Fix type errors in DateSettlementsEditDialog and settlementService

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add contract payment tracking with date, type, and payment history

Features:
- Add actual payment date and payment type \(salary/advance/other\) to contract payments
- Add unique payment reference codes \(PAY-YYYYMM-NNN\) for each payment
- Add PaymentRefDialog to view payment details by clicking ref chips
- Add Payment History button in Contract Weekly tab with date-wise view
- Fix "Payment not found" bug for old SET-* format references
- Add edit/delete dialogs for contract payments
- Add trust_account as payer source option

Database:
- Add payment_type, actual_payment_date, payment_reference columns to labor_payments
- Add payment_week_allocations table for salary allocation tracking
- Add settlement_group_id to labor_payments for linking
- Add generate_payment_reference\(\) function
- Add advance tracking columns and view

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
